description.line1: I am a web and mobile developer

about.title: WHO AM I?
about.subtitle: Here is a brief description :D
about.content:
I am ANDRIAHARINIAINA Kanto Fitiavana
I am a Software Engineering and MSI student passionate about technology and interactivity to create innovative and engaging experiences.

As a Full-Stack Developer, I specialize in building scalable, high-performance applications across both the frontend and backend.

Beyond functionality, I focus on delivering seamless user experiences through well-designed, intuitive interfaces that leave a lasting impression.
I am currently expanding my knowledge of advanced JavaScript
frameworks and libraries

projects.title: TECHNICAL PROJECTS
projects.subtitle: Here are some of the projects I have worked on.

lawyerManagement.title: Lawyer management Intranet
lawyerManagement.description: Developed an intranet platform to manage a lawyer's bar and digitize internal processes.

ecommerce.title: E-commerce Platform
ecommerce.description: Developed an e-commerce platform with features like product browsing, cart management, sales tracking, and user authentication.

classicGames.title: Classic Games Platform
classicGames.description: A platform to play some old classic games such as Tic-Tac-Toe, Snake, Brick Breaker, and Space Invader.

movieSearch.title: Movie Search Application (PWA)
movieSearch.description: Developed a PWA for searching movies, featuring offline support, and integration with a movie database API.

twoFactor.title: 2FA Authentication System
twoFactor.description: Implemented a Two-Factor Authentication (2FA) system with Google Authenticator integration.
